title: Bug
body: Just went to play an aram after the latest update and Darius was just a blue box on the log in screen, then when I got into the game it was flashing black, white, grey like a strobe light with beams of light going around the screen. Alt + F4'd now it's saying there's a problem and I need to fix the LOL client so missed my game + it's been about 15 minutes more!

replies.body:
>Darius was just a blue box

Haven't you heard? That's Darius's new rework, where they're replacing his in-game model with an unanimated, blue rectangular prism!

In all seriousness, this sounds like the result of files in your game directory becoming corrupted. A repair should fix it, but it would be better to simply reinstall the game to make sure none of the corruption is kept. You will lose your item sets and configuration.

What OS are you on, and what graphics card do you have?
